|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,MMCX |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== * [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @700MHz Networking Processor * 802.11ac compliant and backward compatible with 802.11abgn * Data rates of up to 1.3GBps in 802.11ac 80 MHz channels * Built-in 4dBi @2.4GHz & 5dBi @5GHz pyramidal omni smart antenna * Up to 26dBm output power ([[Compex WPJ558]]) === Ordering Configuration ===

8128V523
